thread.title: BRIEF-Fidelity National Information Services Says Board Elected Gary Norcross To Be Chairman Of Board Effective At Expiration Of Martire's Term SEC Filing

title: BRIEF-Fidelity National Information Services Says Board Elected Gary Norcross To Be Chairman Of Board Effective At Expiration Of Martire's Term SEC Filing

organizations.name: brief-fidelity national information services says board elected gary norcross
fidelity national information services says board

text:
Market News April 9, 2018 / 1:06 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Fidelity National Information Services Says Board Elected Gary Norcross To Be Chairman Of Board Effective At Expiration Of Martire's Term SEC Filing Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 9 (Reuters) - Fidelity National Information Services Inc: 
* FIDELITY NATIONAL INFORMATION SERVICES SAYS BOARD ELECTED GARY NORCROSS TO BE CHAIRMAN OF BOARD EFFECTIVE AT EXPIRATION OF MARTIREâ€™S TERM - SEC FILING 
* FRANK R. MARTIRE TO RETIRE FROM BOARD WHEN HIS TERM EXPIRES Source text: ( bit.ly/2Hk3usk ) Further company coverage:
